segments.text: Whoa, I didn't expect to see the sink overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's just cascading over the edge in a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed at all, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle— that's shocking she doesn't feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy's on a stool reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping back— oh no, that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting with her hand up, part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's wide open, full of treats they shouldn't have.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from the window makes the garden pop against this indoor surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes stacked high add to the unexpected busyness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware the adult is to all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels like it's about to erupt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a startling contrast between calm outside and frenzy in.
segments.speaker: PAR
